requests.name: Vacuum Cleaner
requests.description:
Client is the caregiver of 3 young children. 
The family is on financial assistance as her husband is serving his sentence. The family resides in a rental flat, whereby finances are only sufficient for day-to-day necessities. Her vacuum cleaner has malfunctioned and she would not be able to make a purchase of this item. As such, she is willing to receive any pre-loved donation.

requests.name: Fridge
requests.description: A family with 6 children and an elderly requiring a refrigerator to store food and groceries for the household. The current fridge has been leaking. Father is unemployed and mother is earning low wage income.

requests.name: Portable AirCon
requests.description: Family has 2 children with skin disorders (eczema and allergies), their doctor advised getting an aircon to improve their skin condition and reduce discomfort. requests.name: Standing Fan

requests.name: Washing Machine
requests.description: A large family of 7 school going children recently moved into their rental flat in June 2021. Up till now, mother is currently washing their clothes by hand or using the laundromat (unfortunately this exhausts financial resources). A donated or a sponsored new machine will be greatly appreciated.

requests.name: Washing machine
requests.description:
Single mother with 3 children requires a washing machine with a 13amp plug (normal 3-pin, not the rounded plug). Their old one has spoilt and they cannot afford to go laundromat daily to wash their clothes. 

They were previously given another washing machine but it comes with the 15amp pin (round ones) and they do not have the 15amp socket installed in the house, and cannot afford to install a new socket. As such, will need another washing machine suitable for the house.

requests.name: Fridge
requests.description: Family comprises of husband, wife and 5 school-going children. Family has been using fridge for 15 years and it has spoilt. However, as husband has health conditions and mobility issues, he is unemployed. Family faces financial constraints as wife is sole breadwinner.

Client also has Crohn's disease that affect client's bowel movement. Client is required to be on adult diapers and lady pads. requests.name: 5kg of dried prawns
requests.description: We are requesting for 5kg of dried prawns as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

requests.name: CPAP Machine with humidifier
requests.description: A staff of The Helping Hand is diagnosed with obstructive sleep apnea. He is required to sleep with the monitoring of a respironics dreamstation with humidifier every night. He cannot afford to purchase a set of the respoionics dreamstation with humidifier for regulating his breathing while sleeping.

requests.name: Adult Diapers
requests.description: Family of 8 is currently caring for an elderly mother who is recently diagnosed with dementia. Due to current financial difficulties, mother is needing assistance for adult diapers, Tena Size M, due to her incontinence issue. For further liaison on delivery address and sample photo of diapers, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you.

requests.name: Pressure Relief Mattress
requests.description:
Patient is a 39 years old female who is bed-bound and uncommunicative since 2018. She is married with a four-year old son. Patient’s husband is unemployed as he is the full-time caregiver for her. Patient requires a pressure relief mattress to prevent pressure sores. Patient’s current pressure relief mattress is stained with urine and it would be challenging to clean it as patient is always lying on it. The family has difficulty affording a new pressure relief mattress due to husband’s unemployment.

The item can be found here: https://www.medicalsupplies.com.sg/pressure-relief/1873-air-mattress-yh-med-45-cell-pad-mattress-w-pump-per-unit (Pharmex). This is the model similar to patient’s current pressure relief mattress model.

Kindly arrange the donated item to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can Whatsapp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

requests.name: Commode
requests.description:
Elderly lady living in a rental flat. 
She'll require a commode due to her fraility and high fall risks in the toilet.

requests.name: TENA Super XL Pants
requests.description:
Patient is a 42 years old male who is single and living with his elderly mother in a two-room HDB rental flat. His mother is his main caregiver. He requires assistance with his daily activities and is totally dependent. The family does not have any income and is reliant on various assistances for daily subsistence. Thus, the family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables for patient.

Patient uses TENA Super XL Pants. The item can be found here: https://www.watsons.com.sg/pants-super-adult-diapers-xl-12s/p/BP_57783 (Watsons) or https://www.guardian.com.sg/tena-pants-super-xl-12pcs/p/171935 (Guardian).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

Mother is a responsible lady who tries her best to support her family despite her own health condition. The donation of diapers would be very helpful in helping family tide through their challenges.

requests.name: Diapers (Lifree)
requests.description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

If you can assist with this request, please email me or text me at michaeltiew@slec.org.sg or 92357508. thank you.

They are hoping to get a donation of a PS4 and also an electric piano so that their 11-year-old son can have some fun while at home.

Her elderly father has recently undergone a leg amputation, and requires a wheelchair, particularly one that can elevate your feet, to move around and recuperate from the surgery. As client has to care for 4 children, her financial resources are very limited and she is not able to afford to get a good wheelchair for her father.

requests.name: Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

Client struggles to meet family's basic needs based on her sole income, as she also supports her husband financially (e.g. visits him and brings him for medical appointments).

- design: not too childish designs, and not with controversial phrases
- colour preferred: blue, green, grey, brown, black. No white as it gets dirty easily

offers.name: Poppy Seat - rigid seat and table cover for weaning
offers.description:
- Food is most likely to stay in place: the mat is wide enough for infants not to reach the edges and flip it over themselves, it has risen edges for liquids not to pour into our laps and suction cups that keep it stuck to the table top

- Easy to use, store and bring along: can fit almost any chair, whether with a backrest or not, with harness or not, at the table or using the chair feeding tray; it folds and unfolds fast, cleans up well after messy eating, and you can store utensils and other items in the pockets

- Looks good and saves you from embarrassing messes when eating outside home

offers.description:
The pillow is in good condition as it has been used with care, and sanitised before being packed in the original bag.

10 months of daily use, with minor marks from the Velcro hooks catching onto the fabric once my little one began to explore it.

The cover containing the harness is connected to the pillow and can be inserted in a compartment at the back when not in use. 
UNILOVE 4-in-1 Pillow (Maternity Bolster + Nursing Pillow + Baby Nest with Harness + Cot Liner/Bumper)

The harness is fastened using Velcro, but it's meant to fit loosely. It won't stop a 4-6mo from rolling around, only a newborn who started kicking about.

offers.name: Chair Sensor Alarm Pad
offers.description:
https://www.rainbowcare.com.sg/chair-sensor-alarm-pad?search=sensor

- 15" x 15"
- Suitable for dementia patients          

 

Features

The Chair Sensor Alarm Pad alerts the caregiver when pressure is removed from the pad.

- The monitor alarms when pressure is released and alerts the caregiver if the patient falls.
- The alarm sounds immediately when pressure is released from the sensor pad, alerting caregiver to a potential fall.
- The alarm will reset automatically if he patient sits back down.
- Water resistant plastic cover.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS
Overall Dimensions	15" x 15"
38 cm x 38 cm
